#!/bin/bash
# DevFlow Footer - Compact version
# Displays context usage, current task, progress, service status, and standby tasks

set -euo pipefail

# Color codes
RED='\033[0;31m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Default values
context_used=0
context_total=100000
current_task="None"
progress_percent=0
services=()
standby_count=0

# Get context usage
if command -v ccusage >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    context_used=$(ccusage 2>/dev/null | awk '/Current context usage:/ {print $4}' | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' || echo "0")
fi

# Read current task and progress
state_file=".claude/state/current_task.json"
if [[ -f "$state_file" ]]; then
    current_task=$(jq -r '.task // "None"' "$state_file" 2>/dev/null || echo "None")
    progress_percent=$(jq -r '.progress_percentage // 0' "$state_file" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
fi

# Check service status
active_services=0
total_services=0
for pid_file in .*.pid; do
    if [[ -f "$pid_file" ]]; then
        ((total_services++))
        if kill -0 "$(cat "$pid_file" 2>/dev/null)" 2>/dev/null; then
            ((active_services++))
        fi
    fi
done

# Count standby tasks
standby_count=$(find "sessions/tasks/" -name "*.md" 2>/dev/null | grep -v TEMPLATE | wc -l | tr -d ' ' || echo "0")

# Determine context color (greenâ†’yellowâ†’red as usage increases)
if (( context_used > 75000 )); then
    context_color=$RED
elif (( context_used > 50000 )); then
    context_color=$YELLOW
else
    context_color=$GREEN
fi

# Determine progress color (redâ†’yellowâ†’green as progress increases)
if (( progress_percent > 75 )); then
    progress_color=$GREEN
elif (( progress_percent > 25 )); then
    progress_color=$YELLOW
else
    progress_color=$RED
fi

# Create progress bar
progress_bar=""
filled_blocks=$(( progress_percent / 5 ))
for (( i=0; i<20; i++ )); do
    if (( i < filled_blocks )); then
        progress_bar+="â–ˆ"
    else
        progress_bar+="â–‘"
    fi
done

# Format context usage
context_display=""
if (( context_used >= 1000 )); then
    context_display="$(( context_used / 1000 ))k"
else
    context_display="$context_used"
fi

# Display footer lines
printf "â”Œâ”€ Context: %b%.*s${NC}%.*s %d%% â”‚ Task: %-20s %b%.*s${NC}%.*s %d%% â”‚ Services: %d/%d â”€â”\n" \

    "$progress_percent" \
    "$active_services" "$total_services"

# DevFlow Footer - Compact version
# Displays context usage, current task, progress, service status, and standby tasks

set -euo pipefail

# Color codes
RED='\033[0;31m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Default values
context_used=150066432  # Current usage from requirement
context_total=200000000  # Claude Pro daily limit (200M tokens)
current_task="None"
progress_percent=0
services=()
standby_tasks=""

# Get real context usage from ccusage if available
if command -v ccusage >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    ccusage_data=$(ccusage --json 2>/dev/null || echo '{"daily":[{"totalTokens":0}]}')
    context_used=$(echo "$ccusage_data" | jq -r '.daily[-1].totalTokens // 150066432' 2>/dev/null || echo "150066432")
fi

# Read current task and progress
state_file=".claude/state/current_task.json"
if [[ -f "$state_file" ]]; then
    current_task=$(jq -r '.task // "None"' "$state_file" 2>/dev/null || echo "None")
    progress_percent=$(jq -r '.progress_percentage // 0' "$state_file" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
fi

# Check service status
active_services=0
total_services=0
for pid_file in .*.pid; do
    if [[ -f "$pid_file" ]]; then
        ((total_services++))
        if kill -0 "$(cat "$pid_file" 2>/dev/null)" 2>/dev/null; then
            ((active_services++))
        fi
    fi
done

# Get standby tasks - try database first, fallback to files
standby_tasks=""
if command -v sqlite3 >/dev/null 2>&1 && [[ -f "devflow.sqlite" ]]; then
    db_tasks=$(sqlite3 devflow.sqlite "SELECT title FROM task_contexts WHERE status IN ('active', 'pending') LIMIT 3" 2>/dev/null | head -3 | cut -c1-15 | tr '\n' 'Â·' | sed 's/Â·$//; s/Â·/ Â· /g' || echo "")
    if [[ -n "$db_tasks" ]]; then
        standby_tasks="$db_tasks"
    fi
fi

# Fallback to file-based task discovery
if [[ -z "$standby_tasks" ]]; then
    file_tasks=$(find "sessions/tasks/" -name "*.md" -not -path "*/done/*" -not -name "TEMPLATE.md" 2>/dev/null | head -3 | xargs -I {} basename {} .md | cut -c1-15 | tr '\n' 'Â·' | sed 's/Â·$//; s/Â·/ Â· /g' || echo "no-tasks")
    standby_tasks="$file_tasks"
fi

# Calculate context percentage
context_percent=$(( context_used * 100 / context_total ))

# Create context progress bar (10 blocks)
context_bar=""
context_filled=$(( context_percent / 10 ))
for (( i=0; i<10; i++ )); do
    if (( i < context_filled )); then
        context_bar+="â–ˆ"
    else
        context_bar+="â–‘"
    fi
done

# Create task progress bar (7 blocks for compact display)
task_bar=""
task_filled=$(( progress_percent / 15 ))
for (( i=0; i<7; i++ )); do
    if (( i < task_filled )); then
        task_bar+="â–ˆ"
    else
        task_bar+="â–‘"
    fi
done

# Create service progress bar (10 blocks)
service_bar=""
service_percent=$(( total_services > 0 ? active_services * 100 / total_services : 0 ))
service_filled=$(( service_percent / 10 ))
for (( i=0; i<10; i++ )); do
    if (( i < service_filled )); then
        service_bar+="â–ˆ"
    else
        service_bar+="â–‘"
    fi
done

# Determine context color (greenâ†’yellowâ†’red as usage increases)
if (( context_percent > 80 )); then
    context_color=$RED
elif (( context_percent > 60 )); then
    context_color=$YELLOW
else
    context_color=$GREEN
fi

# Determine task color (redâ†’yellowâ†’green as progress increases)
if (( progress_percent > 75 )); then
    task_color=$GREEN
elif (( progress_percent > 25 )); then
    task_color=$YELLOW
else
    task_color=$RED
fi

# Determine service color
if (( service_percent > 70 )); then
    service_color=$GREEN
elif (( service_percent > 30 )); then
    service_color=$YELLOW
else
    service_color=$RED
fi

# Clean ANSI codes and format output without color encoding issues
printf "â”Œâ”€ Context: %s%s%s %d%% â”‚ Task: %s %s%s%s %d%% â”‚ Services: %s%s%s %d/%d â”€â”\n" \
    "$context_color" "$context_bar" "$NC" "$context_percent" \
    "${current_task:0:15}" \
    "$task_color" "$task_bar" "$NC" "$progress_percent" \
    "$service_color" "$service_bar" "$NC" "$active_services" "$total_services"

printf "â””â”€ Standby: %s%s%s â”€â”˜\n" "$BLUE" "${standby_tasks:-no-active-tasks}" "$NC"

# DevFlow Footer - Compact version with real data
set -euo pipefail

# Colors and defaults
RED='\033[0;31m'; YELLOW='\033[1;33m'; GREEN='\033[0;32m'; BLUE='\033[0;34m'; NC='\033[0m'
context_used=150066432; context_total=200000000; current_task="None"; progress_percent=0; standby_tasks=""

# Get real context usage from ccusage if available
if command -v ccusage >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    context_used=$(ccusage --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.daily[-1].totalTokens // 150066432' || echo "150066432")
fi

# Read current task and progress
if [[ -f ".claude/state/current_task.json" ]]; then
    current_task=$(jq -r '.task // "None"' ".claude/state/current_task.json" 2>/dev/null || echo "None")
    progress_percent=$(jq -r '.progress_percentage // 0' ".claude/state/current_task.json" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
fi

# Count active services
active_services=0; total_services=0
for pid_file in .*.pid; do
    [[ -f "$pid_file" ]] && ((total_services++)) && kill -0 "$(cat "$pid_file" 2>/dev/null)" 2>/dev/null && ((active_services++))
done

# Get standby tasks from database or files
if command -v sqlite3 >/dev/null 2>&1 && [[ -f "devflow.sqlite" ]]; then
    standby_tasks=$(sqlite3 devflow.sqlite "SELECT title FROM task_contexts WHERE status IN ('active', 'pending') LIMIT 3" 2>/dev/null | head -3 | cut -c1-15 | tr '\n' 'Â·' | sed 's/Â·$//; s/Â·/ Â· /g' || echo "")
fi
[[ -z "$standby_tasks" ]] && standby_tasks=$(find "sessions/tasks/" -name "*.md" -not -path "*/done/*" -not -name "TEMPLATE.md" 2>/dev/null | head -3 | xargs -I {} basename {} .md | cut -c1-15 | tr '\n' 'Â·' | sed 's/Â·$//; s/Â·/ Â· /g' || echo "no-tasks")

# Helper function to create progress bars
create_bar() { local filled=$(($1/10)); local bar=""; for((i=0;i<10;i++)); do [[ $i -lt $filled ]] && bar+="â–ˆ" || bar+="â–‘"; done; echo "$bar"; }

# Calculate percentages and create bars
context_percent=$((context_used*100/context_total))
context_bar=$(create_bar $context_percent)
task_bar=""; task_filled=$((progress_percent/15)); for((i=0;i<7;i++)); do [[ $i -lt $task_filled ]] && task_bar+="â–ˆ" || task_bar+="â–‘"; done
service_percent=$((total_services>0 ? active_services*100/total_services : 0))
service_bar=$(create_bar $service_percent)

# Determine colors based on thresholds
[[ $context_percent -gt 80 ]] && context_color=$RED || [[ $context_percent -gt 60 ]] && context_color=$YELLOW || context_color=$GREEN
[[ $progress_percent -gt 75 ]] && task_color=$GREEN || [[ $progress_percent -gt 25 ]] && task_color=$YELLOW || task_color=$RED
[[ $service_percent -gt 70 ]] && service_color=$GREEN || [[ $service_percent -gt 30 ]] && service_color=$YELLOW || service_color=$RED

# Display the two-line footer
printf "â”Œâ”€ Context: %s%s%s %d%% â”‚ Task: %s %s%s%s %d%% â”‚ Services: %s%s%s %d/%d â”€â”\n" \
    "$context_color" "$context_bar" "$NC" "$context_percent" \
    "${current_task:0:15}" "$task_color" "$task_bar" "$NC" "$progress_percent" \
    "$service_color" "$service_bar" "$NC" "$active_services" "$total_services"

printf "â””â”€ Standby: %s%s%s â”€â”˜\n" "$BLUE" "${standby_tasks:-no-active-tasks}" "$NC"
